set @vchSQL ='CREATE VIEW [dbo].[View_ConsolidationMainSecurity] AS Select Distinct DimConsolidationID , DimPoolId , DimSecurityID , LTVPassNo From dbo.tblFactConsolidationSecurity FCS Where SecurityRank = 1 ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
